mapper.select: select SUM(payFee) incomeCount from xhOrderInfo where payStatus = 1 and month(orderTime) = ( select month(NOW()) )
SELECT IFNULL((select SUM(payFee) incomeCount from xhOrderInfo where payStatus = 1 and date(orderTime) = ( select date(NOW()) )),0) incomeCount

SELECT d.orderday xhday,IFNULL(oi.ordercount,0) ordercount,IFNULL(oi2.orderpaycount,0) orderpaycount FROM xhday d LEFT JOIN( SELECT COUNT(orderID) ordercount,day(orderTime) orderday FROM xhOrderInfo WHERE month(orderTime) = ( select month(NOW()) ) GROUP BY DATE(orderTime) ) oi on d.orderday = oi.orderday LEFT JOIN( SELECT COUNT(orderID) orderpaycount,day(orderTime) orderday FROM xhOrderInfo WHERE payStatus = 1 and month(orderTime) = ( select month(NOW()) ) GROUP BY DATE(orderTime) ) oi2 on d.orderday = oi2.orderday
SELECT COUNT(orderID) orderc FROM xhOrderInfo WHERE payStatus = 1 and year(orderTime) = ( SELECT year(NOW()) )
